newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Bay Networks more details.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Bay Networks more details.

text.p: Deutsch Morgan Grenfell analyst Noel Lindsay said on Friday he raised his rating on the shares of Bay Networks Inc to buy from accumulate and raising his fiscal 1998 earnings estimate.

-- Lindsay said he was increasing his 1998 earnings estimate to $1.06 per share from $0.95 per share, because he was seeing evidence of strong demand for the company's products in the September quarter.
-- "Though backlog continues to increase, Bay cannot keep taking orders and will have to start shipping," he said. "The stronger demand will be reflected in higher revenues."
-- Sales and marketing, general and administrative costs appeared to be flat too, he said.
-- Lindsay said employee morale at Bay Networks was better than it was before, and the turnover rate had declined.
